p: Mosquito inoculation: The intrathoracic inoculation of adult mosquitoes opened a new sensitive way for DENV isolation. In addition, a method to inoculate mosquito larvae was developed. The mosquito species that have been used include A. aegypti, A. albopictus, Toxorhynchites splendens, and Toxorhynchites amboinensis ( Gubler et al., 1979).
